p: Hello! This is the Index page for the "Hello Blueprint" Confluence Blueprint. It contains listing of all pages in this space that were created with the Blueprint.

The content of this Index page can be changed by editing the plugin file "index.xml".
You can modify the page title by editing the "collector-title-key" attribute in the "content-creator" element of your atlassian-plugin.xml file.
Note that only one Index page exists for each space, so to see any changes you'll need to delete or rename this page, and then create a new "Hello Blueprint" page.

ac:rich-text-body.p:
The list of Blueprint pages in this Index come from the Confluence search index, so you won't see your new page until the Index is refreshed.
You can refresh the index now by going to Content Indexing in the Admin console and clicking "Flush Queue".
